alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bibb, northeastern Peach, north central Houston and east central Crawford Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Byron, or 10 miles northeast of Fort Valley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Powerville and Jack Brown Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
